docblock.description: Abstract base class to represent a set of configuration options

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: strategy Which strategy to use when fetching terms

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: order How the result should be ordered

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: tags_list_type How the $tags_list should be used

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: color Which coloring strategy to use

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: color_span_to Which color value to start from in color calculation. This is the color that the smallest tag will get.

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: color_span_from Which color value to end at in color calculation. This is the color that the biggest tag will get.

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: color_set A set of colors to randomly select from when coloring the tags

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: taxonomy Which taxonomy to show tags from

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: post_type An array of post type names to to include posts from in tag size calculation

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: authors Which authors to include posts from. An empty array will include all authors

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: tags_list A list of term IDs to be included or excluded. Inclusion or exclusion is determined by $tags_list_type

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: post_term A list of term IDs which the posts needs to have to be included in tag size calculation

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: max Maximum number of tags to display

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: minimum How many posts a term needs to have to be shown in the cloud

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: days_old How many days old a post needs to be to be included in tag size calculation

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: reverse If the order of tags should be shown in reverse order

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: case_sensitive If sorting should be applied case sensitive

Class to represent a the configuration options for cloud rendering retrieval

tag.description: show_links If the tags should be wrapped in links

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: link_underline If links should be styled with underline decoration

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: link_bold If links should be styled as bold

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: link_italic If links should be styled as italic

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: hover_underline If links should be decorated with underline decoration in their hover state

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: hover_bold If links should be styled as bold in their hover state

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: hover_italic If links should be styled as italic in their hover state

tag.description: hover_bg_color Background color for links in their hover state

tag.description: hover_color Text color for links in their hover state

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: hover_border_style Border style for links in their hover state

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: hover_border_width Border width for links in their hover state

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: hover_border_color Border color for links in their hover state

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: debug If debug output should be included

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: line_height CSS line-height for the tags

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: show_title_text If the widget title should be shown

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: alignment How the text in the resulting cloud should be aligned

tag.name: property-read
tag.description: display How the resulting cloud should be displayed
